text: Percha Leanpuri (24 June 1986 â€“ 19 August 2021) was an Indonesian politician. She was a member of the Nasdem Party. She was on the People's Representative Council from 2019 to 2021 and the Regional Representative Council from 2009 to 2015. She was the daughter of Governor of South Sumatra Herman Deru. Leanpuri was born in South Sumatra, Indonesia. Leanpuri died on 19 August 2021 at a hospital in Palembang, Indonesia from while giving birth at the age of 35. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Deaths in childbirth Category:South Sumatra
title: Percha Leanpuri
